list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small fiery particle thrown off from a fire, alight in ashes, or produced by striking together two hard surfaces such as stone or metal.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a log fire was sending sparks onto the rug
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một đám cháy nhật ký đã gửi tia lửa lên tấm thảm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a trace of a specified quality or intense feeling.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a tiny spark of anger flared within her
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một tia sáng giận dữ nhỏ bé bùng lên trong cô ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: emit sparks of fire or electricity.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the ignition sparks as soon as the gas is turned on
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: đánh lửa tia lửa ngay khi khí được bật

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he went a sparking among the rosy country girls
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta đã có một tia lửa trong số những cô gái quê hương hồng hào
